data.title: Jennifer Carpenter and Michael C. Hall Divorcing
data.meta_description: "Dexter" Costars Are Calling it Quits After Two Years of Marriage
data.text:
NEW YORK (CBS) It's over between "Dexter" costars Jennifer Carpenter and Michael C. Hall.

The pair, who play brother and sister on the Showtime drama, are divorcing after two years of marriage, their rep confirmed to Entertainment Weekly on Wednesday.

PICTURES: Celebrity Splits

"Having been separated for some time, Jennifer Carpenter and Michael C. Hall have filed for divorce," their rep said in a joint statement.

Both reps add that the split was amicable.

Earlier this year, Hall, 39, completed treatment for Hodgkin's lymphoma.

He and Carpeter, 31, met on the set of their show and tied the knot on Dec. 31, 2008.
